Glyph.Name: Glyph of Battle
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Battle Shout ability by 2 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Bloodrage
Glyph.Description: Reduces the health cost of your Bloodrage ability by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Charge
Glyph.Description: Increases the range of your Charge ability by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Command
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Commanding Shout ability by 2 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Enduring Victory
Glyph.Description: Increases the window of opportunity in which you can use Victory Rush by 5 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mocking Blow
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage of your Mocking Blow ability by 25%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Thunder Clap
Glyph.Description: Increases the radius of your Thunder Clap ability by 2 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Barbaric Insults
Glyph.Description: Your Mocking Blow ability generates 100% additional threat.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Bladestorm
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on Bladestorm by 15 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blocking
Glyph.Description: Increases your block value by 10% for 10 sec after using your Shield Slam ability.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Bloodthirst
Glyph.Description: Increases the healing you receive from your Bloodthirst ability by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Cleaving
Glyph.Description: Increases the number of targets your Cleave hits by 1.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Devastate
Glyph.Description: Your Devastate ability now applies two stacks of Sunder Armor.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Enraged Regeneration
Glyph.Description: Your Enraged Regeneration ability heals for an additional 10% of your health over its duration.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Execution
Glyph.Description: Your Execute ability deals damage as if you had 10 additional rage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hamstring
Glyph.Description: Gives your Hamstring ability a 101% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Heroic Strike
Glyph.Description: You gain 10 rage when you critically strike with your Heroic Strike ability.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Intervene
Glyph.Description: Increases the number attacks you intercept for your Intervene target by 1.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Last Stand
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Last Stand ability by 1 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mortal Strike
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage of your Mortal Strike ability by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Overpower
Glyph.Description: Adds a 100% chance to enable your Overpower when your attacks are parried.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rapid Charge
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Charge ability by 7%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rending
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Rend ability by 6 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Resonating Power
Glyph.Description: Reduces the rage cost of your Thunder Clap ability by 5.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Revenge
Glyph.Description: After using Revenge, your next Heroic Strike costs no rage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shield Wall
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on Shield Wall by 2 min, but Shield Wall now only reduces damage taken by 40%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shockwave
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on Shockwave by 3 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Spell Reflection
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on Spell Reflection by 1 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Sunder Armor
Glyph.Description: Your Sunder Armor ability affects a second nearby target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Sweeping Strikes
Glyph.Description: Reduces the rage cost of your Sweeping Strikes ability by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Taunt
Glyph.Description: Increases the chance for your Taunt ability to succeed by 8%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Victory Rush
Glyph.Description: Your Victory Rush ability has a 30% increased critical strike chance.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Vigilance
Glyph.Description: Your Vigilance ability transfers an additional 5% of your target's threat to you.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Whirlwind
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Whirlwind by 2 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blessing of Kings
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Blessing of Kings and Greater Blessing of Kings spells by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blessing of Might
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Blessing of Might spell by 20 min when cast on yourself.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blessing of Wisdom
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Blessing of Wisdom spell by 20 min when cast on yourself.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Lay on Hands
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Lay on Hands spell by 5 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Sense Undead
Glyph.Description: Damage against Undead increased by 1% while your Sense Undead ability is active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of the Wise
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Seal of Wisdom spell by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Avenger's Shield
Glyph.Description: Your Avenger's Shield hits 2 fewer targets, but for 100% more damage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Avenging Wrath
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Hammer of Wrath spell by 50% while Avenging Wrath is active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Beacon of Light
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Beacon of Light by 30 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Cleansing
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Cleanse and Purify spells by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Consecration
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration and cooldown of Consecration by 2 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Crusader Strike
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Crusader Strike ability by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Divine Plea
Glyph.Description: While Divine Plea is active, you take 3% reduced damage from all sources.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Divine Storm
Glyph.Description: Your Divine Storm now heals for an additional 15% of the damage it causes.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Divinity
Glyph.Description: Your Lay on Hands grants twice as much mana as normal and also grants you as much mana as it grants your target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Exorcism
Glyph.Description: Increases damage done by Exorcism by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Flash of Light
Glyph.Description: Your Flash of Light has an additional 5% critical strike chance.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hammer of Justice
Glyph.Description: Increases your Hammer of Justice range by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hammer of the Righteous
Glyph.Description: Your Hammer of the Righteous hits 1 additional target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hammer of Wrath
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of Hammer of Wrath by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Holy Light
Glyph.Description: Your Holy Light grants 10% of its heal amount to up to 5 friendly targets within 8 yards of the initial target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Holy Shock
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Holy Wrath
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Wrath spell by 15 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Judgement
Glyph.Description: Your Judgements deal 10% more damage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Righteous Defense
Glyph.Description: Increases the chance for your Righteous Defense and Hand of Reckoning abilities to work successfully by 8% on each target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Salvation
Glyph.Description: When you cast Hand of Salvation on yourself, it also reduces damage taken by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Seal of Command
Glyph.Description: You gain 8% of your base mana each time you use a Judgement with Seal of Command active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Seal of Light
Glyph.Description: While Seal of Light is active, the effect of your healing spells is increased by 5%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Seal of Righteousness
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage done by Seal of Righteousness by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Seal of Vengeance
Glyph.Description: Your Seal of Vengeance or Seal of Corruption also grants 10 expertise while active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Seal of Wisdom
Glyph.Description: While Seal of Wisdom is active, the cost of your healing spells is reduced by 5%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shield of Righteousness
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of Shield of Righteousness by 80%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Spiritual Attunement
Glyph.Description: Increases the amount of mana gained from your Spiritual Attunement spell by an additional 2%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Turn Evil
Glyph.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Turn Evil spell by 100%, but increases the cooldown by 8 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Feign Death
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Feign Death spell by 5 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mend Pet
Glyph.Description: Your Mend Pet spell increases your pet's happiness slightly.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Possessed Strength
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage your pet inflicts while using Eyes of the Beast by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Revive Pet
Glyph.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Revive Pet by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Scare Beast
Glyph.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Scare Beast by 75%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of the Pack
Glyph.Description: Increases the range of your Aspect of the Pack ability by 15 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Aimed Shot
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Aimed Shot ability by 2 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Arcane Shot
Glyph.Description: Your Arcane Shot refunds 20% of its mana cost if the target has one of your Stings active on it.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Aspect of the Viper
Glyph.Description: Increases the amount of mana gained from attacks while Aspect of the Viper is active by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Bestial Wrath
Glyph.Description: Decreases the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 20 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Chimera Shot
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of Chimera Shot by 1 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Deterrence
Glyph.Description: Decreases the cooldown of Deterrence by 10 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Disengage
Glyph.Description: Decreases the cooldown of Disengage by 5 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Explosive Shot
Glyph.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of Explosive Shot by 4%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Explosive Trap
Glyph.Description: The periodic damage from your Explosive Trap can now be critical strikes.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Freezing Trap
Glyph.Description: When your Freezing Trap breaks, the victim's movement speed is reduced by 30% for 4 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Frost Trap
Glyph.Description: Increases the radius of the effect from your Frost Trap by 2 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hunter's Mark
Glyph.Description: Increases the attack power bonus of your Hunter's Mark by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Immolation Trap
Glyph.Description: Decreases the duration of the effect from your Immolation Trap by 6 sec., but damage while active is increased by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Kill Shot
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of Kill Shot by 6 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mending
Glyph.Description: Increases the healing done by your Mend Pet ability by 40%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Multi-Shot
Glyph.Description: Decreases the cooldown of Multi-Shot by 1 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rapid Fire
Glyph.Description: Increases the haste from Rapid Fire by an additional 8%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Raptor Strike
Glyph.Description: Reduces damage taken by 20% for 3 sec after using Raptor Strike.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Scatter Shot
Glyph.Description: Increases the range of Scatter Shot by 3 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Serpent Sting
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Serpent Sting by 6 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Snake Trap
Glyph.Description: Snakes from your Snake Trap take 90% reduced damage from area of effect spells.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Steady Shot
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage dealt by Steady Shot by 10% when your target is afflicted with Serpent Sting.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of the Beast
Glyph.Description: Increases the attack power bonus of Aspect of the Beast for you and your pet by an additional 2%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of the Hawk
Glyph.Description: Increases the haste bonus of the Improved Aspect of the Hawk effect by an additional 6%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Trueshot Aura
Glyph.Description: While your Trueshot Aura is active, you have 10% increased critical strike chance on your Aimed Shot.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Volley
Glyph.Description: Decreases the mana cost of Volley by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Wyvern Sting
Glyph.Description: Decreases the cooldown of your Wyvern Sting by 6 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blurred Speed
Glyph.Description: Enables you to walk on water while your Sprint ability is active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Distract
Glyph.Description: Increases the range of your Distract ability by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Pick Lock
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cast time of your Pick Lock ability by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Pick Pocket
Glyph.Description: Increases the range of your Pick Pocket ability by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Safe Fall
Glyph.Description: Increases the distance your Safe Fall ability allows you to fall without taking damage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Vanish
Glyph.Description: Increases your movement speed by 30% while the Vanish effect is active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Adrenaline Rush
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Adrenaline Rush by 5 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Ambush
Glyph.Description: Increases the range on Ambush by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Backstab
Glyph.Description: Your Backstab increases the duration of your Rupture effect on the target by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 additional sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blade Flurry
Glyph.Description: Reduces the energy cost of Blade Flurry by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Cloak of Shadows
Glyph.Description: While Cloak of Shadows is active, you take 40% less physical damage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Crippling Poison
Glyph.Description: Increases the chance to inflict your target with Crippling Poison by an additional 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Deadly Throw
Glyph.Description: Increases the slowing effect on Deadly Throw by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Envenom
Glyph.Description: Your Envenom ability no longer consumes Deadly Poison from your target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Evasion
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Evasion by 5 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Eviscerate
Glyph.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of Eviscerate by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Expose Armor
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Expose Armor by 12 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fan of Knives
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage done by Fan of Knives by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Feint
Glyph.Description: Reduces the energy cost of Feint by 20.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Garrote
Glyph.Description: Reduces the duration of your Garrote ability by 3 sec and increases the total damage it deals by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Ghostly Strike
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage dealt by Ghostly Strike by 40% and the duration of its effect by 4 sec., but increases its cooldown by 10 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Gouge
Glyph.Description: Reduces the energy cost of Gouge by 15.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hemorrhage
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage bonus against targets afflicted by Hemorrhage by 40%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hunger for Blood
Glyph.Description: Increases the bonus damage from Hunger For Blood by 3%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Killing Spree
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on Killing Spree by 45 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mutilate
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cost of Mutilate by 5 energy.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Preparation
Glyph.Description: Your Preparation ability also instantly resets the cooldown of Blade Flurry, Dismantle, and Kick.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rupture
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Rupture by 4 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Sap
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Sap by 20 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shadow Dance
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Shadow Dance by 2 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Sinister Strike
Glyph.Description: Your Sinister Strike critical strikes have a 101% chance to add an additional combo point.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Slice and Dice
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Slice and Dice by 3 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Sprint
Glyph.Description: Increases the movement speed of your Sprint ability by an additional 30%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Tricks of the Trade
Glyph.Description: The bonus damage and threat redirection granted by your Tricks of the Trade ability lasts an additional 4 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Vigor
Glyph.Description: Vigor grants an additional 10 maximum energy.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fading
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Fade spell by 30%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fortitude
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Levitate
Glyph.Description: Your Levitate spell no longer requires a reagent.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shackle Undead
Glyph.Description: Increases the range of your Shackle Undead spell by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shadow Protection
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Shadow Protection and Prayer of Shadow Protection spells by 10 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shadowfiend
Glyph.Description: Receive 5% of your maximum mana if your Shadowfiend dies from damage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Circle of Healing
Glyph.Description: Your Circle of Healing spell heals 1 additional target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Dispel Magic
Glyph.Description: Your Dispel Magic spell also heals your target for 3% of maximum health.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Dispersion
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on Dispersion by 45 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fade
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fade spell by 9 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fear Ward
Glyph.Description: Reduces cooldown and duration of Fear Ward by 60 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Flash Heal
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Flash Heal by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Guardian Spirit
Glyph.Description: If your Guardian Spirit lasts its entire duration without being triggered, the cooldown is reset to 1 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Holy Nova
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage and healing of your Holy Nova spell by an additional 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hymn of Hope
Glyph.Description: Your Hymn of Hope lasts an additional 2 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Inner Fire
Glyph.Description: Increases the armor from your Inner Fire spell by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Lightwell
Glyph.Description: Increases the amount healed by your Lightwell by 20%

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mass Dispel
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of Mass Dispel by 35%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mind Control
Glyph.Description: Reduces the chance targets will resist or break your Mind Control spell by an additional 17%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mind Flay
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage done by your Mind Flay spell by 10% when your target is afflicted with Shadow Word: Pain.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mind Sear
Glyph.Description: Increases the radius of effect on Mind Sear by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Pain Suppression
Glyph.Description: Allows Pain Suppression to be cast while stunned.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Penance
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of Penance by 2 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Power Word: Shield
Glyph.Description: Your Power Word: Shield also heals the target for 20% of the absorption amount.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Prayer of Healing
Glyph.Description: Your Prayer of Healing spell also heals an additional 20% of its initial heal over 6 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Psychic Scream
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Psychic Scream by 2 sec. and increases its cooldown by 8 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Renew
Glyph.Description: Reduces the duration of your Renew by 3 sec. but increases the amount healed each tick by 25%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Scourge Imprisonment
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cast time of your Shackle Undead by 1.1 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shadow
Glyph.Description: While in Shadowform, your non-periodic spell critical strikes increase your spell power by 30% of your Spirit for 10 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shadow Word: Death
Glyph.Description: Targets below 35% health take an additional 10% damage from your Shadow Word: Death spell.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shadow Word: Pain
Glyph.Description: The periodic damage ticks of your Shadow Word: Pain spell restore 1% of your base mana.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Smite
Glyph.Description: Your Smite spell inflicts an additional 20% damage against targets afflicted by Holy Fire.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Spirit of Redemption
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Spirit of Redemption by 6 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Astral Recall
Glyph.Description: Cooldown of your Astral Recall spell reduced by 7.5.1 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Ghost Wolf
Glyph.Description: Your Ghost Wolf form regenerates an additional 1% of your maximum health every 5 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Renewed Life
Glyph.Description: Your Reincarnation spell no longer requires a reagent.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Thunderstorm
Glyph.Description: Increases the mana you receive from your Thunderstorm spell by 2%, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Water Breathing
Glyph.Description: Your Water Breathing spell no longer requires a reagent.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Water Shield
Glyph.Description: Increases the number of charges on your Water Shield spell by 1.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Water Walking
Glyph.Description: Your Water Walking spell no longer requires a reagent.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Chain Heal
Glyph.Description: Your Chain Heal heals 1 additional target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Chain Lightning
Glyph.Description: Your Chain Lightning strikes 1 additional target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Earth Shield
Glyph.Description: Increases the amount healed by your Earth Shield by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Earthliving Weapon
Glyph.Description: Increases the chance for your Earthliving weapon to trigger by 5%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Elemental Mastery
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Elemental Mastery ability by 30 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Feral Spirit
Glyph.Description: Your spirit wolves gain an additional 30% of your attack power.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fire Elemental Totem
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Elemental Totem by 5 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fire Nova
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Nova spell by 3 seconds.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Flame Shock
Glyph.Description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Flame Shock damage by 60%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Flametongue Weapon
Glyph.Description: Increases spell critical strike chance by 2% while Flametongue Weapon is active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Frost Shock
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Frost Shock by 2 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Healing Stream Totem
Glyph.Description: Your Healing Stream Totem heals for an additional 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Healing Wave
Glyph.Description: Your Healing Wave also heals you for 20% of the healing effect when you heal someone else.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hex
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage your Hex target can take before the Hex effect is removed by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Lava
Glyph.Description: Your Lava Burst spell gains an additional 10% of your spellpower.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Lava Lash
Glyph.Description: Damage on your Lava Lash is increased by an additional 10% if your weapon is enchanted with Flametongue.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Lesser Healing Wave
Glyph.Description: Your Lesser Healing Wave heals for 20% more if the target is also affected by Earth Shield.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Lightning Bolt
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Bolt by 4%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Lightning Shield
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage from Lightning Shield by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mana Tide Totem
Glyph.Description: Your Mana Tide Totem grants an additional 1% of each target's maximum mana each time it pulses.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Riptide
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Riptide by 6 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shocking
Glyph.Description: Reduces the global cooldown triggered by your shock spells to 1 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Stoneclaw Totem
Glyph.Description: Your Stoneclaw Totem also places a damage absorb shield on you, equal to 4 times the strength of the shield it places on your totems.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Stormstrike
Glyph.Description: Increases the Nature damage bonus from your Stormstrike ability by an additional 8%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Thunder
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on Thunderstorm by 10 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Totem of Wrath
Glyph.Description: When you cast Totem of Wrath, you gain 30% of the totem's bonus spell power for 300 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Water Mastery
Glyph.Description: Increases the passive mana regeneration of your Water Shield spell by 30%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Windfury Weapon
Glyph.Description: Increases the chance per swing for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 2%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Arcane Intellect
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance spells by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blast Wave
Glyph.Description: The mana cost of your Blast Wave spell is reduced by 15%, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fire Ward
Glyph.Description: You have an additional 5% chance to reflect Fire spells while your Fire Ward is active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Frost Armor
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by 30 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Frost Ward
Glyph.Description: You have an additional 5% chance to reflect Frost spells while your Frost Ward is active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Slow Fall
Glyph.Description: Your Slow Fall spell no longer requires a reagent.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of the Bear Cub
Glyph.Description: Your Polymorph: Sheep spell polymorphs the target into a polar bear cub instead.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of the Penguin
Glyph.Description: Your Polymorph: Sheep spell polymorphs the target into a penguin instead.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Arcane Barrage
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of Arcane Barrage by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Arcane Blast
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage from your Arcane Blast buff by 3%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Arcane Explosion
Glyph.Description: Reduces mana cost of Arcane Explosion by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Arcane Missiles
Glyph.Description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Arcane Missiles by 25%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Arcane Power
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Arcane Power by 3 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blink
Glyph.Description: Increases the distance you travel with the Blink spell by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Deep Freeze
Glyph.Description: Increases the range of Deep Freeze by 10 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Eternal Water
Glyph.Description: Your Summon Water Elemental now lasts indefinitely, but your Water Elemental can no longer cast Freeze.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Evocation
Glyph.Description: Your Evocation ability also causes you to regain 60% of your health over its duration.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fire Blast
Glyph.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of Fire Blast by 50% when the target is stunned or incapacitated.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fireball
Glyph.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by 0.15.2 sec, but removes the damage over time effect.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Frost Nova
Glyph.Description: Your Frost Nova targets can take an additional 20% damage before the Frost Nova effect automatically breaks.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Frostbolt
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage dealt by Frostbolt by 5%, but removes the slowing effect.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Frostfire
Glyph.Description: Increases the initial damage dealt by Frostfire Bolt by 2% and its critical strike chance by 2%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Ice Armor
Glyph.Description: Your Ice Armor and Frost Armor spells grant an additional 50% armor and resistance.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Ice Barrier
Glyph.Description: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your Ice Barrier by 30%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Ice Block
Glyph.Description: Your Frost Nova cooldown is now reset every time you use Ice Block.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Ice Lance
Glyph.Description: Your Ice Lance now causes 4 times damage against frozen targets higher level than you instead of triple damage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Icy Veins
Glyph.Description: Your Icy Veins ability also removes all movement slowing and cast time slowing effects.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Invisibility
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of the Invisibility effect by 10 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Living Bomb
Glyph.Description: The periodic damage from your Living Bomb can now be critical strikes.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mage Armor
Glyph.Description: Your Mage Armor spell grants an additional 20% mana regeneration while casting.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mana Gem
Glyph.Description: Increases the mana received from using a mana gem by 40%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mirror Image
Glyph.Description: Your Mirror Image spell now creates a 4th copy.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Molten Armor
Glyph.Description: Your Molten Armor grants an additional 20% of your spirit as critical strike rating.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Polymorph
Glyph.Description: Your Polymorph spell also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Remove Curse
Glyph.Description: Your Remove Curse spell also makes the target immune to all curses for 4 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Scorch
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage of your Scorch spell by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Water Elemental
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Summon Water Elemental spell by 30 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Curse of Exhaustion
Glyph.Description: Increases the range of your Curse of Exhaustion spell by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Drain Soul
Glyph.Description: Your Drain Soul ability occasionally creates an additional soul shard.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Enslave Demon
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cast time of your Enslave Demon spell by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Kilrogg
Glyph.Description: Increases the movement speed of your Eye of Kilrogg by 50% and allows it to fly in areas where flying mounts are enabled.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Souls
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Ritual of Souls spell by 70%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Unending Breath
Glyph.Description: Increases the swim speed of targets affected by your Unending Breath spell by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Chaos Bolt
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on Chaos Bolt by 2 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Conflagrate
Glyph.Description: Your Conflagrate spell no longer consumes your Immolate or Shadowflame spell from the target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Corruption
Glyph.Description: Your Corruption spell has a 4% chance to cause you to enter a Shadow Trance state after damaging the opponent. The Shadow Trance state reduces the casting time of your next Shadow Bolt spell by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Curse of Agony
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Curse of Agony by 4 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Death Coil
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Death Coil by 0.5.1 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Demonic Circle
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on Demonic Circle by 4 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Fear
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage your Fear target can take before the Fear effect is removed by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Felguard
Glyph.Description: Increases the Felguard's total attack power by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Felhunter
Glyph.Description: When your Felhunter uses Devour Magic, you will also be healed for that amount.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Haunt
Glyph.Description: The bonus damage granted by your Haunt spell is increased by an additional 3%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Health Funnel
Glyph.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while channeling your Health Funnel spell by 100%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Healthstone
Glyph.Description: You receive 30% more healing from using a healthstone.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Howl of Terror
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown on your Howl of Terror spell by 8 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Immolate
Glyph.Description: Increases the periodic damage of your Immolate by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Imp
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage done by your Imp's Firebolt spell by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Incinerate
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage done by Incinerate by 5%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Life Tap
Glyph.Description: When you use Life Tap or Dark Pact, you gain 20% of your Spirit as spell power for 40 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Metamorphosis
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Metamorphosis by 6 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Quick Decay
Glyph.Description: Your haste now reduces the time between periodic damage ticks of your Corruption spell.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Searing Pain
Glyph.Description: Increases the critical strike bonus of your Searing Pain by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shadow Bolt
Glyph.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Shadow Bolt by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shadowburn
Glyph.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of Shadowburn by 20% when the target is below 35% health.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shadowflame
Glyph.Description: Your Shadowflame also applies a 70% movement speed slow on its victims.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Siphon Life
Glyph.Description: Increases the healing you receive from your Siphon Life talent by 25%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Soul Link
Glyph.Description: Increases the percentage of damage shared via your Soul Link by an additional 5%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Soulstone
Glyph.Description: Increases the amount of health you gain from resurrecting via a Soulstone by 300%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Succubus
Glyph.Description: Your Succubus's Seduction ability also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Unstable Affliction
Glyph.Description: Decreases the casting time of your Unstable Affliction by 0.2.1 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Voidwalker
Glyph.Description: Increases your Voidwalker's total Stamina by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Aquatic Form
Glyph.Description: Increases your swim speed by 50% while in Aquatic Form.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Challenging Roar
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Challenging Roar ability by 30 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Dash
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Dash ability by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of the Wild
Glyph.Description: Mana cost of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells reduced by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Thorns
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Thorns ability by 50 min when cast on yourself.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Typhoon
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cost of your Typhoon spell by 8% and increases its radius by 10 yards, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Unburdened Rebirth
Glyph.Description: Your Rebirth spell no longer requires a reagent.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Barkskin
Glyph.Description: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 25% while Barkskin is active.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Berserk
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Berserk by 5 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Claw
Glyph.Description: Reduces the energy cost of your Claw ability by 5.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Entangling Roots
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage your Entangling Roots victims can take before the Entangling Roots automatically breaks by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Focus
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage done by Starfall by 10%, but decreases its radius by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Frenzied Regeneration
Glyph.Description: While Frenzied Regeneration is active, healing effects on you are 20% more powerful.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Growl
Glyph.Description: Increases the chance for your Growl ability to work successfully by 8%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Healing Touch
Glyph.Description: Decreases the cast time of Healing Touch by 1.5.1 sec, the mana cost by 25%, and the amount healed by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hurricane
Glyph.Description: Your Hurricane ability now also slows the movement speed of its victims by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Innervate
Glyph.Description: Innervate now grants the caster 45% of his base mana pool over 10 sec in addition to the normal effects of Innervate.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Insect Swarm
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage of your Insect Swarm ability by 30%, but it no longer affects your victim's chance to hit.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Lifebloom
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Lifebloom by 1 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Mangle
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage done by Mangle by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Maul
Glyph.Description: Your Maul ability now hits 1 additional target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Monsoon
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Typhoon spell by 3 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Moonfire
Glyph.Description: Increases the periodic damage of your Moonfire ability by 75%, but initial damage is decreased by 90%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Nourish
Glyph.Description: Your Nourish heals an additional 6% for each of your heal over time effects present on the target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rake
Glyph.Description: Your Rake ability prevents targets from fleeing.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rapid Rejuvenation
Glyph.Description: Your haste now reduces the time between the periodic healing ticks of your Rejuvenation spell.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rebirth
Glyph.Description: Players resurrected by Rebirth are returned to life with 100% health.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Regrowth
Glyph.Description: Increases the healing of your Regrowth spell by 20% if your Regrowth effect is still active on the target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rejuvenation
Glyph.Description: While your Rejuvenation targets are below 50% health, you will heal them for an additional 50% health.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rip
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Rip ability by 4 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Savage Roar
Glyph.Description: Your Savage Roar ability grants an additional 3% bonus damage done.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Shred
Glyph.Description: Each time you Shred, the duration of your Rip on the target is extended 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Starfall
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of Starfall by 30 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Starfire
Glyph.Description: Your Starfire ability increases the duration of your Moonfire effect on the target by 3 sec, up to a maximum of 9 additional seconds.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Survival Instincts
Glyph.Description: Your Survival Instincts ability grants an additional 15% of your maximum health.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Swiftmend
Glyph.Description: Your Swiftmend ability no longer consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect from the target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Wild Growth
Glyph.Description: Wild Growth can affect 1 additional target.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Wrath
Glyph.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting your Wrath spell by 50%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blood Tap
Glyph.Description: Your Blood Tap no longer causes damage to you.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Corpse Explosion
Glyph.Description: Increases the radius of effect on Corpse Explosion by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Death's Embrace
Glyph.Description: Your Death Coil refunds 20 runic power when used to heal.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Horn of Winter
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Horn of Winter ability by 1 min.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Pestilence
Glyph.Description: Increases the radius of your Pestilence effect by 5 yards.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Raise Dead
Glyph.Description: Your Raise Dead spell no longer requires a reagent.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Anti-Magic Shell
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Anti-Magic Shell by 2 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Blood Strike
Glyph.Description: Your Blood Strike causes an additional 20% damage to snared targets.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Bone Shield
Glyph.Description: Adds 1 additional charge:charges; to your Bone Shield.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Chains of Ice
Glyph.Description: Your Chains of Ice also causes 144 to 157 Frost damage, increased by your attack power.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Dancing Rune Weapon
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of Dancing Rune Weapon by 5 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Dark Command
Glyph.Description: Increases the chance for your Dark Command ability to work successfully by 8%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Dark Death
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage or healing done by Death Coil by 15%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Death and Decay
Glyph.Description: Damage of your Death and Decay spell increased by 20%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Death Grip
Glyph.Description: When you deal a killing blow that grants honor or experience, the cooldown of your Death Grip is refreshed.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Death Strike
Glyph.Description: Increases your Death Strike's damage by 1% for every 1 runic power you currently have (up to a maximum of 25%). The runic power is not consumed by this effect.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Disease
Glyph.Description: Your Pestilence ability now refreshes disease durations and secondary effects of diseases on your primary target back to their maximum duration.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Frost Strike
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cost of your Frost Strike by 8 Runic Power.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Heart Strike
Glyph.Description: Your Heart Strike also reduces the movement speed of your target by 50% for 10 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Howling Blast
Glyph.Description: Your Howling Blast ability now infects your targets with Frost Fever.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Hungering Cold
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cost of Hungering Cold by 40 runic power.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Icebound Fortitude
Glyph.Description: Your Icebound Fortitude now always grants at least 40% damage reduction, regardless of your defense skill.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Icy Touch
Glyph.Description: Your Frost Fever disease deals 20% additional damage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Obliterate
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage of your Obliterate ability by 25%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Plague Strike
Glyph.Description: Your Plague Strike does 20% additional damage.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rune Strike
Glyph.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Rune Strike by 10%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Rune Tap
Glyph.Description: Your Rune Tap heals yourself for an additional 10% of the effect, and also heals your party for 10% of their maximum health.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Scourge Strike
Glyph.Description: Your Scourge Strike increases the duration of your diseases on the target by 3 sec, up to a maximum of 9 additional seconds.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Strangulate
Glyph.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Strangulate by 20 sec.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of the Ghoul
Glyph.Description: Your Ghoul receives an additional 40% of your Strength and 40% of your Stamina.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Unbreakable Armor
Glyph.Description: Increases the total armor granted by Unbreakable Armor to 30%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Unholy Blight
Glyph.Description: Increases the damage done by Unholy Blight by 40%.

Glyph.Name: Glyph of Vampiric Blood
Glyph.Description: Increases the duration of your Vampiric Blood by 5 sec.
